title: Hear The Big Train Leave the Station - SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Hear The Big Train Leave the Station - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Walter Johnson, aka WaJo, aka Big Train, with his hands at chest is ready to be sold.  There is a crease that traverses the card above the ear and eye level.  A second smaller crease drops through the ear and between the nose and mouth exiting at a small notch in the right border.  The reverse is a Sweet Cap 350-460 Fact 42 NC.  Overall this is a very presentable low grade example of this HOFer  

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-raw/10780/johnson-hands[/IMG]

The card has been sold.

Thanks for looking and "All aboard"
This is not a live auction per se.  My error.  I will ask that the thread be moved to the T206 section.
My .02 is that this thread is off the tracks.  But perhaps someone will step up and pay the freight.
